title: [Large-scale] Advanced Mathematics Project-based Learning Course Through Structured Learning Activity Design

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge and job application experience
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environments and formative assessment-centered operations utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Within four weeks, learners can establish a structured activity design framework to develop a mathematics project-based learning plan
During the project period, learners can submit activity improvement proposals incorporating peer feedback through biweekly peer reviews
In the final assessment, over 80% of learners can complete a mathematical modeling project applicable to real-world work problems

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Notion)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
